statements: SELECT * FROM satellites;
SELECT name, launch_date FROM satellites;
SELECT id, name, location FROM satellites WHERE launch_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM satellites ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, location, launch_date FROM satellites WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM satellites WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, launch_date FROM satellites ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT id, name, ST_AsText(location) AS 'location' FROM satellites WHERE name LIKE '%star%';
SELECT * FROM satellites WHERE launch_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY launch_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS 'count', MAX(id) AS 'max_id' FROM satellites;
SELECT id, name, location, launch_date FROM Satellites WHERE id = '6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c8'
SELECT name, launch_date FROM Satellites WHERE location IS NOT NULL
SELECT id, launch_date FROM Satellites ORDER BY launch_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Satellites WHERE name LIKE '%Orbit%'
SELECT id, name, distance FROM Satellites JOIN DistanceCalculations ON Satellites.id = DistanceCalculations.satellite1_id
SELECT * FROM Satellites ORDER BY name DESC, launch_date ASC
SELECT name, launch_date FROM Satellites WHERE location IS NOT NULL
SELECT id, name, ST_AsText(location) AS location_text FROM Satellites
SELECT id, distance FROM DistanceCalculations WHERE distance > 1000 ORDER BY distance DESC
SELECT S.name AS satellite1_name, S2.name AS satellite2_name, DC.distance FROM DistanceCalculations DC JOIN Satellites S ON DC.satellite1_id = S.id JOIN Satellites S2 ON DC.satellite2_id = S2.id
SELECT * FROM satellites WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM satellites ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, distance FROM distances WHERE distance > 1000;
SELECT satellite1_id, satellite2_id, distance FROM distances ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT id, calculation_time, calculation_result FROM calculations WHERE calculation_time < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM distances WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance DESC, satellite1_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT satellite1_id, satellite2_id, distance FROM distances WHERE satellite1_id = 3 OR satellite2_id = 4 ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT name, location FROM satellites WHERE ST_DISTANCE(location, ST_GeogPoint(50, 30)) < 5000 ORDER BY name;
SELECT * FROM calculations WHERE calculation_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY calculation_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT satellite1_id, COUNT(*) AS num_calc FROM distances GROUP BY satellite1_id HAVING num_calc > 5 ORDER BY num_calc DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellites;
SELECT id, name FROM satellites ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, location FROM satellites WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, distance_km, timestamp FROM distances WHERE distance_km > 1000 ORDER BY distance_km;
SELECT * FROM analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM satellites;
SELECT name, location FROM satellites WHERE id = 1;
SELECT MAX(distance_km) FROM distances;
SELECT calculation_result, calculation_date FROM calculations ORDER BY calculation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM satellites;
SELECT satellite_name, longitude, latitude FROM satellites ORDER BY satellite_id DESC;
SELECT measurement_time, measurement_value FROM satellite_measurements WHERE satellite_id = 1;
SELECT distance FROM distances WHERE from_satellite_id = 2 AND to_satellite_id = 3;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM satellites;
SELECT satellite_name, longitude, latitude FROM satellites WHERE latitude > 0 ORDER BY longitude DESC;

SELECT s.satellite_name, m.measurement_time, m.measurement_value FROM satellites s JOIN satellite_measurements m ON s.satellite_id = m.satellite_id WHERE m.measurement_value > 100 ORDER BY m.measurement_time ASC;

SELECT d.distance_id, s1.satellite_name AS from_satellite, s2.satellite_name AS to_satellite, d.distance FROM distances d JOIN satellites s1 ON d.from_satellite_id = s1.satellite_id JOIN satellites s2 ON d.to_satellite_id = s2.satellite_id WHERE d.distance > 500 ORDER BY d.distance DESC;

SELECT c.calculation_id, u.username AS calculated_by, c.calculated_distance, c.calculation_time FROM calculations c JOIN users u ON c.from_satellite_id = u.user_id WHERE u.username = 'John' AND c.calculated_distance < 1000 ORDER BY c.calculation_time DESC;
